item.title: Turning my personal website dream into reality ft.Hugo
item.description:
The Inception ðŸŒ 

Since I began programming, I had been wanting a website of my own. Surely it is one of those things that initially gets someone to pursue programming. Not me though. I wanted a website to showcase my art, and programming projects and have a place to help grow my thoughts in. I wanted a very functional, yet lean website that didn’t pull my focus away from my projects and life.
